newsitem.title: UK: Rolls Royce gets $500 mln Trent 700 order.
newsitem.headline: Rolls Royce gets $500 mln Trent 700 order.

text.p: British engineering group Rolls Royce Plc said on Monday it had received a $500 million order for Trent 700 engines to power Emirates airline's fleet of Airbus Industrie A330-200 aircraft.
The Dubai-based airline ordered 16 of the aircraft from Airbus, with options on another seven jetliners, Rolls Royce said in a statement. Deliveries begin in January 1999.
Rolls Royce said the order made Emirates one of the UK's biggest airline customers, including its previous order for Trent 800 engines for its seven Boeing Co 777 aircraft.
